title: NBA RETWEET
subtitle:
Mom passed early on
Dad was a political prisoner during teens
Had to flee his home country(war)
4 yrs w/o electricity & running water in a refugee camp
Lived on the street for 2 yrs
Scouted to play ball in Spain after playing for U-15 Jr National Team

title: üêücarol hedges
subtitle:
My parents came to this country as German Jewish refugees. They had nothing.
I am watching the SAME trajectory that drove them out of their homeland being enacted here. Both in your party & the Conservatives.
So many Jews are leaving
So many EU friends are also going too
#Jewishpic.twitter.com/o8iQxr241t

title: Ayla Albayrak
subtitle: As a journalist visited many, many refugee camps in Turkey and other countries but never a place as desperate and filthy as #Moria in Greek Lesbos, not even the camp inside Syria. And this #refugee camp of 19,000 people is in #Europe ‚Äî I mean the #EU How is this possible?pic.twitter.com/thBAL7BTLc

title: SYMAAG
subtitle:
Today we remember our friend and comrade Andy Shallice who died in Sheffield on December 14.
Andy fought, with determination and humour, for justice for refugees and the Roma community.
We will honour and remember him by fighting on for what he held dear.

RIP Andy 1952-2019 pic.twitter.com/27lOSdi4Vh
